main.name: Yuanda(Danny) Song
main.description: I graduated from Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) with a B.S. degree in Computer Science and I have 3 years of programming and software engineering experience. I am a solid software developer with a bunch of development experience in Java/JavaScript/Python/C#/RESTful API/Spring/React
main.bio: Candidate with strong programming, analytic and designing skills. Has three years of experience in software development. Strong knowledge of computer science and programming skills in Java, Python, SQL and with experience in RESTful API, Spring framework and React.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: B.S. Computer Science Minor: Data Science GPA:3.63/4.00

work.title: Analyst Developer Intern
work.description_1: Developed a RESTful API with .NET Framework to allow client to communicate with serverside services to access databases
work.description_2: Built a permission manager web application to allow the administrator to modify the users’ permission in the company’s databases in ASP.NET framework and React

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description_1: Developed pipelines and algorithms to predict the protentional fraud in the stock market based on labeled data via Python (Numpy and Sklearn)
work.description_2: Performed SQL commands to extract the data of all the stocks in China from 2007 to 2018
work.description_3: Trained supervised machine learning models including Logistic Regression and SVM to predict future stock fraud, and applied SMOTE algorithm to overcome the imbalanced dataset

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description_1: Used MVVM framework (Vue.js) to develop a dynamic and interactive voting webpage
work.description_2: Built NoSQL database (Firebase) to store and access users’ data to increase the data availability
work.description_3: Worked with Node Package Management (NPM) for configuring the project according to needs

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description_1: Developed a Kiosk Navigation Application for the B&W Hospital that allows users to navigate in the B&W Hospital using Java, JavaFX and Derby on an Agile team
work.description_2: Collaborated with team on implementing new features and modern UI in an Agile environment
work.description_3: Conducted JUnit Tests for the application to ensure the correctness of the program

projects.name: TicketPlus: A Java Web Service Application – Event Search and Recommendation
projects.description_1: Created Java servlets with RESTful APIs to handle HTTP requests and responses
projects.description_2: Built relational and NoSQL databases (MySQL, MongoDB) to real business data (location, price, category, etc.) from Ticketmaster API
projects.description_3: Deployed server side to Amazon EC2 to handle 150 QPS (Tested by Apache Jmeter)

projects.name: iShop: A Spring and Hibernate based Shopping and Ordering system
projects.description_1: Built a web application based on Spring MVC to implement searching and listing.
projects.description_2: Used Hibernate to support the database operations
projects.description_3: Developed a Spring Web Flow to support item ordering

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
